text:
Hello all!

I have a question regarding the Send e-commerce sync message API:

<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/ecommerce/v2/send-sync-messages>

I want to sync the line items in a deal so it reflects what the customer actually has in its cart. So how do I remove a line item from the deal? This note *"Please note:* that the DELETE action type will not remove the object from HubSpot, it will prevent it from syncing in the future." suggests that the line item remains when you delete it...
